description: Automatic generation of Testbench and Instance from Verilog
configuration.instanceOutputMode.descrip: Default output mode for Instance generation
configuration.testbenchOutputMode.descri: Default output mode for Testbench generation
configuration.instanceOutputPath.descrip: Output path for Instance files (relative to source file)
configuration.testbenchOutputPath.descri: Output path for Testbench files (relative to source file)
configuration.instanceOutputFileName.des: Output file name of the Instance (replace the actual file name with ${baseName} )
configuration.testbenchOutputFileName.de: Output file name of the Testbench (replace the actual file name with ${baseName} )
configuration.selectedInstanceTemplate.d: Selected Instance template (leave blank for default) (Ctrl+Shift+P Open Command Palette > Create Template > Select Template)
Selected Testbench template (leave blank for default) (Ctrl+Shift+P Open Command Palette > Create Template > Select Template)
